experience.title: Recommendation System Project
experience.description: • Implemented User based & Item based Collaborative Filtering using User Similarity and Item Similarity Matrices to make predictions.• Filtered out the products based on user ratings and found out the correlations between the ratings of various products with the others.• User Product data was generated using the random value generator of numpy. In this model Cosine Similarity (KNN) was Used.
experience.description_html: • Implemented User based & Item based Collaborative Filtering using User Similarity and Item Similarity Matrices to make predictions.• Filtered out the products based on user ratings and found out the correlations between the ratings of various products with the others.• User Product data was generated using the random value generator of numpy. In this model Cosine Similarity (KNN) was Used. <!---->

experience.title: Digital Marketing Intern
experience.description: • Planned and executed all digital marketing, including SEO/SMO, marketing database, email, social media, and advertising campaigns.• Analyzed trends and insights to optimize the spending and performance of the initiatives taken and campaigns launched.• Organized 'Startup and Business Meet N Mixture', which included 3 events viz EduTech, Digital Marketing, and Startup Story.

projects: [{"title":"COVID19 Data Analysis Using Python","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"• Imported COVID19 dataset and prepared it for the analysis by dropping columns and aggregating rows.• Decided on and calculating a good measure for our analysis.• Merged two datasets and found correlations among our data.• Visualized our analysis results using Seaborn."},{},{"title":"Neural Network Visualizer Web App with Python","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"• Created a Neural Network Visualizer web application using Streamlit, and a simple model server using Keras and Flask. • Used Keras to train a Neural Network model, and used Keras' functional API to create a model with multiple outputs. • Created a web application that will visualize the outputs of all the nodes of all the layers of the neural network for a given input image."},{"title":"Nano-indentation Testing for Strain-Rate Sensitivity Analysis | Under: Prof. Debalay Chakrabarti | IITKGP","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"• Did Constant Strain Rate(CSR) Test at Maximum Strain rate on the specimen to obtain Hardness vs. Depth Curve.• From the obtained curve determined the Depth at which Indentation Depth Effect Vanishes.• For Strain Rate Jump Test, at variable indentation depths, the abrupt changes are made at different indentation strain-rates.• Analyzed the relation between Strain Rate Sensitivity and DBTT (Ductile to Brittle Transition Temperature )."},{"title":"Medium Mn Steel for Automotive Application | Under: Prof. Tapas K Bandyopadhyay | IITKGP","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"• Analyzed the characterization of the forged specimen by SEM image and EBSD(Electron Back scatter Diffraction)phase map.• Examined Optical Micrographs of the specimen annealed for 15 mins, 30 mins, 60 mins, 120 mins at 1273K temperature.• The medium-Mn steels possess raised ductility and it additionally helps in lowering the production cost over the 2nd-generation AHSS."}]
